title: Project: HFT Simulation
content:
## Microstructure Simulation

True HFT requires FPGAs and C++, but we can simulate the logic in Python to understand Order Book dynamics.

### Limit Order Book (LOB)

Maintain a data structure of Bids and Asks sorted by price and time. Simulate order matching.

### Strategy: Order Flow Imbalance

If the buy volume in the order book is significantly higher than sell volume, price is likely to tick up due to buying pressure.
